report.rawcontent: all plots 25-May-1993 : B : Crop transplanted 02-Feb-94 : B : Hytane 500 Sc at 4.0 1 in 220 1. 08-Apr-94 : B : Scythe at 5.0 1 in 220 1. 06-May-94 : B : Muriate of potash at 233 kg. : T : NITROGEN Nl: 34.5% N at 60 kgN/ha in 174 kg. : T : NITROGEN N2: 34.5% N at 120 kgN/ha in 348 kg. 22-Feb-95 : B : Cut

all plots 10-Mar-97 : B : Barclay Gallup at.4.0 1 in 200 1. 11-Apr-97 : B : Muriate of potash at 281 kg. 22-May-1997: T : NITROGEN Nl: 34.5% N at 60 kgN/ha in 174 kg. : T : NITROGEN N2: 34.5% N at 120 kgN/ha in 348 kg. 04-Feb-98 : B : Hand harvested.
